hadiths.text: It was narrated form Muhammad bin Sad Abi Waqqas, from his father, that:the Prophet struck one hand with the other and said: "The month is like this and like this and like this," retaining one finger the third time

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى إِسْمَاعِيلَ فِي خَبَرِ سَعْدِ بْنِ مَالِكٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: mentioning The Differences Reported From Ismail In The Narration Of Sad Bin Malik About that
